name: My face
description:
Disclaimer: This isn't a game.

It's a piece of self-obsession - about my face and the face that's underneath it without the makeup. It's me sharing how I feel about some of that. It's a cross between a silly thing, a serious thing & a brain download thing.

Move the mirror around my face & I'll tell you all about it.

All interaction (movement & scrolling through dialogue) is via the arrow keys.

Thanks to Ruin for creating Image to Bitsy https://ruin.itch.io/image-to-Bitsy.

This Bitsy has not been sponsored by Bare Minerals, Rimmel, NYX, Kiko, MAC, Sleek, Nivea, no. 7, Bourjois, or Autograph.... but maybe by Maybelline. :P
